DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date on which a Study Chair responds to the notification letter from a Group Chairperson.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Date that a Study Chair responds to the notification letter from a Group Chairperson.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical trial.:A chairperson is the officer who presides at the meetings of an organization, committee, or other organizational structure.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
The officer who presides at the meetings of an organization, committee, or other organizational structure.

Property.preferredDefinition: Response; a bodily process occurring due to the effect of some foregoing stimulus or agent.:No value exists.

Concepts.definition: Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 6/1/12 - Released as part of content cleanup task; CDE used by AE-CIP and SAE Reporting-caBIG CSIs.  jc   7/7/11 Retired due to lack of use in active CDEs.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
